description: --- license: mit --- # Content Vec Best Official Repo: ContentVec This repo brings fairseq ContentVec model to HuggingFace Transformers. ## How to use To use this model, you need to define and then load the model with ## How to convert You need to download the ContentVec_legacy model from the official repo, and then run
model_explanation_gemini: Converts fairseq ContentVec models to HuggingFace Transformers format for embedding generation.
